#summary GNU/Linux compilation.
#labels Documentation,Linux,Compilation

= Creating the configure script =


This first step will create the configure scripts for your machine.
{{{
aclocal
autoconf
automake --add-missing -c
}}}


= Compiling the project =


Once the configure files are ready, you can use the script to generate the Makefiles.
{{{
./configure
}}}
Then, you can use the normal Makefile compilation process:
{{{
make
}}}
